mapper.select: SELECT idn.ID "submitSid" ,idn.NAME "name" ,s.SUBMIT_FILE "submit_file" ,to_char(s.submit_date,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') "submit_date" ,s.SCOMMENT "s_comment" ,s.score "score" ,s.register_id "registerId" ,p.opennum "opennum" FROM hw_student s JOIN hw_professor p on s.REGISTER_ID= p.REGISTER_ID JOIN id_name idn on s.SUBMIT_SID=idn.ID WHERE s.REGISTER_ID=#{registerId} ORDER BY s.submit_date asc

SELECT idn.id "submitSid" ,idn.name "name" FROM score_mana sm LEFT outer join hw_student s ON sm.SID=s.SUBMIT_SID JOIN id_name idn ON idn.id=sm.sid WHERE sm.opennum=#{opennum} AND s.SUBMIT_SID is null
SELECT distinct l.lyear "lyear" FROM lecture l LEFT OUTER JOIN hw_professor p ON p.OPENNUM=l.OPENNUM JOIN lecture_info i on l.lnum=i.LNUM WHERE l.pid=#{pid} and l.lyear!=2021 ORDER BY l.lyear asc
SELECT distinct i.lname "lname" , i.lnum "lnum" FROM lecture l LEFT OUTER JOIN hw_professor p ON p.OPENNUM=l.OPENNUM JOIN lecture_info i on l.lnum=i.LNUM WHERE l.pid=#{pid}

SELECT distinct l.lyear "lyear" ,l.term "term" ,i.lname "lname" ,l.book "book" ,l.lrcode "lrcode" ,i.lnum "lnum" ,l.opennum "opennum" ,l.dividenum "dividenum" ,lr.location "location" ,lr.lrname "lrname" FROM lecture l JOIN lecture_info i ON l.lnum=i.LNUM JOIN lecture_room lr ON l.lrcode=lr.lrcode WHERE l.pid=#{pid} and l.lyear = TO_CHAR(sysdate,'RRRR') AND l.datestatus='수강중'
